name: Totem (itch) (KennyRoy)
description: Totem is a first-person puzzler, much in the same vein as Portal and Talos Principle.  In Totem, you play as a person who has fallen into a cavern with no escape, that turns out to be a prison for an ancient god. When he awakens, he offers you a deal; in exchange for a little of his power, he will guide you out of the temple, but you have to free him first.
